name: mindbloging

scripts.build: echo 'Installing backend dependencies...' && cd backend && npm install && echo 'Backend dependencies installed successfully'
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.start: echo 'Starting backend server...' && cd backend && node server.js
scripts.deploy: npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Installing backend deps in postinstall...' && cd backend && npm install || echo 'Backend install failed'

description: MindBloging - A full-stack blog platform built with MERN stack
